sources.title: Blood Cult (1985) SLASHER
sources.description:
The first movie made specifically for the home video market!
It's FRIGHT NIGHT @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Juli Andelman, Charles Ellis, James Vance
Director: Christopher Lewis

Female coeds at a Midwestern college are being slaughtered in a wave of brutal murders, each marked by a missing body part and a golden dog-head amulet left on the corpse. Could this be the work of a sinister, canine-worshiping blood cult?

TRIVIA: BLOOD CULT marks the first collaboration between husband-and-wife directing/producing duo Christopher and Linda Lewis and Tulsa-based Bill F. Blair. Together, they would later produce "The Ripper," starring Tom Savini.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: A mysterious serial killer is killing several female co-eds on and off a college campus in Oklahoma and the only clues are gold medallions left by the bodies. A grizzled police detective sets out to find the killer, but is unaware that all the killings are connected to a Satanic cult. The detective, Ron, turns from the hunter to the hunted when he sees that no one around him can be trusted, not even his own daughter.
metadata.Actors: Juli Andelman, Charles Ellis, James Vance, Bennie Lee McGowan
